code: import React from"react";import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import axios from"axios";import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,useNavigate,Link,Navigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var EstateForm2=function EstateForm2(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var navigate=useNavigate();var user=useSelector(function(state){return state.user;});var ip=useSelector(function(state){return state.ip;});var estateLot=function estateLot(b){console.log(b);dispatch({type:"setEstate",payload:b});};function onFormSubmit(event){event.preventDefault();var form=document.getElementById("form");console.log(form.elements);var estate=form.elements.estate;console.log(estate.value);var estateDB={userid:user.id,estatename:estate.value};var req="http://"+ip+":9002/estate";axios.post(req,estateDB).then(function(response){console.log(response);estateLot(response.data);if(response.data!=""){navigate("/fullmanifest");}}).catch(function(error){return console.error(error);});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{className:"text-danger",style:{color:"#ffffff"},children:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onFormSubmit,id:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"",children:"Register Estate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",name:"estate"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Register",className:"btn btn-dark btn-block"})]})]})})]})});};export default EstateForm2;
